site_name: Southmere Village - Phase 1BThamesmeadLONDONSE2 9LH
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Application to approve details of condition 32 (BREEAM) pursuant to application 16/01251/FULM for demolition of existing buildings/hard standing, residential development of 525 units and 3691 sqm (GIA) of commercial floorspace with flexible uses across classes A1-A3 (retail, financial/professional services, caf√©/restaurants), B1a (office), D1 (Non-residential institutions) and D2 (Assembly and leisure) and associated works including, informal and formal open space, internal road network; landscaping;car & cycle parking;waste storage.
